data.name: Not Customer-First, People-First: Discover & Thrive Help Navigate Financial Literacy
data.summary:
Drawing from their collective experiences, Julie & Arianna will discuss topics such as:

Prioritizing the human element without sacrificing the bottom line/customer service

Pivoting how Discover and Thrive Global can best serve people in the face of a pandemic

The scientific link between financial health and overall well-being

Advice they would give to their younger selves
